text: I highly recommend Chester's classes. His professionalism and rigor are evident in the structured and effective learning experience he provides. What sets him apart is his ability to foster a warm and connected atmosphere, making even challenging material accessible and enjoyable. I've seen significant improvement in my guitar skills thanks to his guidance.

Very thankful for Chester, who is very willing to teach whatever he knows and is very patient to follow through. He is very intentional when it comes to his planning for each class, to run through all the different things that I struggled with and continue to encourage to not give up! Would highly recommend!

Chester is able to break down difficult music theory into simpler terms that enable you to understand better. And better understanding your music theory is fundamental to easier pick up learning any kind of music instrument!

Chester is also adamant on building up your foundation in music before exploring other things out there, and I agree that a solid foundation is the key to building up your skills.
